title: Nursing Practice Competency Enhancement: Contradiction-Based Leadership Development: Decision-Making Skills in Complex Situations

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of organizational management and understanding of leadership theories
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Identify and explain three or more leadership contradictions arising in complex organizational settings.
Present two or more practical strategies to maintain balance between mutually exclusive leadership requirements.
Apply actionable approaches to resolve emotional and political conflicts during leadership development processes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
